The map below displays groups of visualisations:

SG Open Space: Overview of Singapore, contains data on areas to consider and avoid

Buffer Zones: Overview of identified area of interest (Lim Chu Kang + Murai), with buffer zones to accomodate natural reserves

POI: Place of Interest containing all land space that is considered potentially viable

Rivers: Considering the suitability of the rivers in our POI for solar farm installations

LCK: Considering the suitability of Lim Chu Kang in our POI for solar farm installations
